reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly states that personal information is collected and outlines the types of data collected.

reply.question: 2. If the app declares the collection of data, what type of data does it collect?

answer.full_answer: Contact details, name, contact information, education, employment, employment history, financial information, transaction information, purchase history, financial details, and payment information.

reply.analysis: The data collected by the app includes a wide range of personal information related to contact details, financial information, employment history, and more.
reply.reference: Category | Examples | Collected | A. Identifiers | Contact details, name, contact information, education, employment, employment history, financial information, transaction information, purchase history, financial details, and payment information | YES | URL: http://44.235.70.104/privacypolicy/

of Regulations defines a "resident" as:
(1) every individual who is in the State of California for other than a temporary or transitory purpose and
(2) every individual who is domiciled in the State of California who is outside the State of California for a temporary or transitory purpose
All other individuals are defined as "non-residents."
If this definition of "resident" applies to you, we must adhere to certain rights and obligations regarding your personal information.

reply.question: 4. Can the user opt out of data collection or delete data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the user can opt out of data collection or delete data.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy explicitly states that users can request to terminate their account, allowing for the deactivation or deletion of their account and information from databases. Additionally, users can opt-out from future selling of their personal information to third parties.
reply.reference: Upon your request to terminate your account, we will deactivate or delete your account and information from our active databases. However, we may retain some information in our files to prevent fraud, troubleshoot problems, assist with any investigations, enforce our Terms of Use and/or comply with applicable legal requirements. URL: http://44.235.70.104/privacypolicy/. Coach Bobby has not disclosed or sold any personal information to third parties for a business or commercial purpose in the preceding 12 months. Coach Bobby will not sell personal information in the future belonging to website visitors, users and other consumers. URL: http://44.235.70.104/privacypolicy/.

DO-NOT-TRACK FEATURES
Most web browsers and some mobile operating systems and mobile applications include a Do-Not-Track ("DNT") feature or setting you can activate to signal your privacy preference not to have data about your online browsing activities monitored and collected. At this stage no uniform technology standard for recognizing and implementing DNT signals has been finalized. As such, we do not currently respond to DNT browser signals or any other mechanism that automatically communica...

reply.question: 5. Does the app share data with third parties?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app may share personal information with service providers as outlined in the privacy policy.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy states that the app may disclose personal information with service providers pursuant to a written contract, not for selling purposes. This indicates sharing data with third parties.
reply.reference: We may disclose your personal information with our service providers pursuant to a written contract between us and each service provider. Each service provider is a for-profit entity that processes the information on our behalf. This is not considered to be 'selling' of your personal data. Coach Bobby will not sell personal information in the future belonging to website visitors, users and other consumers. URL: http://44.235.70.104/privacypolicy/

reply.question: 6. If the app shares data with third parties, what third parties does the app share data with?

answer.full_answer: The app shares data with service providers pursuant to a written contract between the app and each service provider.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy specifies that the app shares data with service providers as detailed in written contracts.
reply.reference: We may disclose your personal information with our service providers pursuant to a written contract between us and each service provider. Each service provider is a for-profit entity that processes the information on our behalf. URL: http://44.235.70.104/privacypolicy/
